page.title: 18LONGTON CHILDRENS LIFE STYLE
page.content: The children of Longton are encouraged to take many extra - curricular activities. Parents are willing to transport 3 or 4 friends for football games, riding or dancing lessons. Most children try to play a musical instrument, usually beginning at 7 years old with recorder or guitar then piano lessons soon afterwards. At home, children keep pets. Unless they are allergic to them almost every child has one kind of animal to look after. Popular pets are dogs, cats, rabbits, guinea pigs and budgies. There are quite a few goldfish and, of course, specialists who keep tropical fish tanks or canaries in aviaries. The schools encourage pupils to look after animals by keeping them at school. During the holidays the pets go to the children's homes.
